website_summaries.verdict: This very affordable diaper bag backpack can also be used as a backpack or handbag.
pros: Made from durable oxford fabric, which is water-resistant and easy to wipe clean
With a large main compartment, separate storage pockets with insulation, and wet clothes pocket, you can put a milk bottle, water bottle, clothes, diaper, towel, and more in their own sections

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The listing is for the Land diaper bag. What I received instead is a cheap off brand diaper bag. I am beyond upset!!! DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way except very poor craftsmanship/quality
customer_reviews.text: After trying out several different brands of diaper backpacks, I finally settled on this one because of the large capacity, lightweight, practical storage units and nice look of this bag. Unfortunately, not much can be said for the quality, during my FIRST outing with the bag (short outing for errands), I noticed the stitching was already coming undone. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: It is the size of a backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! It's very roomy and large. Only thing that I could find wrong with it is that there are some random strings dangling off of the straps. Other then that its perfect. Will review again after a couple of uses!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: There's definitely a reason this bag is cheaper than the other options. I have the Sunveno diaper bag in coral and I love it. I bought this bag in black for a gift seeing that it was a cheaper option. Compared to the Sunveno branded bag, this does not stand a chance. The material is definitely cheaper and the size of the bag itself is smaller. I will be returning this bag and purchasing the Sunveno bag instead. Sunveno Mummy Maternity Nappy Bag Brand Large Capacity Baby Bag Travel Backpack Desiger Nursing Bag for Baby Care Green
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It is by far, the best diaper backpack I've purchase. It holds all my kids things and is very durable. I don't worry about anything falling out of place or things being thrown around in the bag while I carry it. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lawsonville

customer_reviews.title: Tried 3 of this bag design. This wasn’t my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of this bag style on amazon. Same colors. Same descriptions. Different brands. I returned this one as it wasn’t my favorite. It lacked the D rings to hook on the stroller, was much much smaller than the other 2 and didn’t feel high quality. PROS- it does have nice storage options. Nice color. Love the cell Phone pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love the features of this bag but as soon as I put this bag on my bag the strap ripped and almost tore completely. So sad, I really wanted to love this bag. Update- the company contacted me and they agreed to replace the bag immediately and apologized for the inconvenience! Now this is the type of service a customer appreciates.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag/awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! Currently on baby number three and this by far is my favorite bag. I get so many compliments on it. Lots of space! It’s big enough to carry everything I need for a 2 year old and 2 month old as well as things I would normally throw on my purse. Large opening. Great color. Lots of pockets. Trendy. Can either be carried as a backpack or with handles. This bag is so lightweight. I would definitely recommend this to a friend. I’ll probably buy this as a gift for friends having babies as well. It’s such a great price as well! Least expensive diaper bag I’ve had and it’s by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews stating they paid $11. That's about how much this thing should cost. I paid $35!!!!!! With so many positive reviews I thought maybe it was worth it. NOPE! It's so inky dinky and the straps are about as nice as a cheapo backpack you'd buy at a discount store. This thing is a joke. Pretty upset the seller thinks this is worth $35!!
customer_reviews.author: Just choose kindness

customer_reviews.title: Two year update!
customer_reviews.text: I see i didn't write a review for this particular color when I purchased in May 2018. I have used this bag DAILY since July 2018. It has been everywhere with us. I don't baby it at all. It holds so so much stuff it's amazing. I now use it for my 2yo and newborn. Only thing I warn against with this particular color is staining. Attached are pictures of the bag, this morning 10/13/2020, right out of the washer. It is pretty stained up. But again, I don't baby it and it's been everywhere from the softball park, to amusement parks, dirt, all types of environments. I highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie

customer_reviews.title: FURIOUS about the smell; it’s safe to wash, but still smells
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived wreaking of noxious chemicals. The material quality and color seemed fine. It’s a little more matte color than the picture, but it’s still fine. After letting the bag air out for a week, I machine washed and dried the bag TWICE and couldn’t completely remove the chemical scent. Since I washed it, I can’t return it, but I don’t feel like it’s safe to use either. If anyone is curious, the bag held up perfectly in the washer and dryer, however. No fading or fraying.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA G.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my favorite purchases. This is a perfect diaper bag for the mom with more then one child to pack for. It’s durable and roomy. **********UPDATE******** Now that the diaper bag is being used I’m finding the side top pocket (THE POCKET THAT IS USED TO HOLD ALL MOMMIES PURSE ITEMS). Will not unzip or zip with ease. It gets stuck I’ve checked there is no fabric in the way absolutely defective. I have no way of contacting this company directly. Make sure before you use that you zip and unzip a few times. The point of purchasing this one was because of the setup and size.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal to a fault

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so torn with this product because I absolutely loved the functionality of this product. I have recommended it to several Moms in passing. But...my son is 6 months and it has almost completely fallen apart. Both side inside pockets ripped out on the bottom, one of the two backpack buckles broke on the back with a seam in stiching as well. It’s completely unusable at this point. So disappointed.:(
customer_reviews.author: Summer Dawn Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Inside pocket tore after only a week of use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the blue color and the size of the bag. Everything would have been perfect if the side pocket inside the bag didn't tear. And even worse, I didn't use that pocket for anything. When I decided to put a small club cracker bag in there I discovered the hole. I was really disappointed in the quality of the bag and requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was great for vacation! I had toys in it, wipes in one outside, side pocket, my phone in the other outside, side pocket and other necessities for traveling with a child and two adults. My one gripe would be not having a security loop on each side of the zipper to help with zipping. One handed is impossible or a quick dash when you have a crazy kid you need to get outside. One review mentioned the straps being a little too narrow which I also agree with. Overall, this is a great bag and was helpful to keep my hands free when they needed to be.
customer_reviews.author: CWalter

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s price.
customer_reviews.text: Very modern, girlish and stylish. I liked how much space it has in the inside specially since we graduated from baby diaper bag to toddler diaper bag. I didn’t like how cheap the plastic felt, how the cords just hang loose and there is no way to tight them. The zipper is hard to open/close with one hand since it is just loose at the ends (specially when dealing with a kid and sometimes you need things fast) the baby wipes opening storage doesn’t align with The baby wipes but it could be that we use Costco brand and they are extra big.
customer_reviews.author: GonzoM

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: We have three children so we need a large bag. I love that there are zippers to open the bottom so you can put clothes on top of the diapers etc. It is actually easier to organize than traditional diaper bags I used with my first and second child. I love the backpack feature. Holding a toddler it is much easier to hold the child and have a backpack. Traditional diaper bags would slide off my shoulder too easily. My husband loves the black look with the leather tags. He feels less embarrassed carrying this than other baby colored bags which was a huge reason we chose the colors that we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Stop! This is what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag with tons of space and several divider pockets! I have 2 young children and was able to carry diapers, wipes, extra clothes, a bottle, snacks, a blanket, burp cloths, medicine, 2 sippy cups, pjs a handful of small toys and my purse basics without a problem. For the price it's a steal for sure! I love the smooth backpack straps, insulated bottle holders and the wet pocket is perfect for a flat ice pack. I have recommended this to several friends already.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ann Silsbe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is a great diaper bag for my now 5 month old. The color is so cute and the storage is great. I've never washed it, but I definitely think it would hold up well. I just spot clean when needed. I get tons of compliments and like that I can be hands free while wearing this. My only complaint is that it is hard to zip one handed, which with an infant I find my self one handed more times than not.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Kmiec

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Third review. First two were taken down. This is not a good product. 0/10. Do not buy this. The zipper is bad and the fabric is trash.
customer_reviews.author: bdepalo

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice size, multiple pockets, great color Cons: cheaply made zipper, bottle pockets too small (wouldn’t fit my Como Tomo bottles) I was very excited to receive this bad but unfortunately it was just really cheap looking and I decided to return it. I got the grey color and it came with a gold and black zipper. The color really clashes and I just couldn’t get past that. The bottles just wouldn’t fit no matter how much I pushed. I had to place them on the inside of the bag which is ok but defeats the purpose of having a separate bottle pocket. Returning the bag
customer_reviews.author: Sep F.

customer_reviews.title: The straps were two different heights (even after trying to adjust- it was almost like they were sewn wrong) and the outside quote is ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return. The backpack had a strange odor. Very plastic-y smelling. The inside is very cheaply made. The straps were two different heights (even after trying to adjust- it was almost like they were sewn wrong) and the outside quote is just a little strange. Back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BAG! AMAZING PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this diaper bag about a year now! We LOVVEEEE it! It's super easy to use and easy to carry around. It has amazing compartment space and the inside is easy to clean! Outside isn't as easy to clean but the bag is so amazing that it kind of outweighs that part. Pros: great price, good color, a lot of storage space, easy to clean inside, comfortable for everyday or even a backpack for college student. Cons: outside is kind of hard to clean. Would recommend and plan on buying buying another one! I've gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Pansy

customer_reviews.title: daddy approved diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: bf really loves this as it isnt girly or a typical bag, so when he carries his daughter around in public he doesnt feel silly with pink everything and it is easy to manage since it is a back pack, he can easily throw the bag on and carry baby.. we will never go back to old fashion shoulder diaper bags. these are so much more convenient. It h old alot and has alot of pockets inside with makes it nice.. i love the zipper part in the back that allows you to grab something from the bottom out.. i was worried our Avent bottles wouldn't fit but they do so thats a plus.. .
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: So much better than what we had before
customer_reviews.text: We used the big bulky diaper handbag for years before trying this out...wish we had made the change so much sooner! Has a surprising amount of storage in the main compartment and the extra pockets. So easy to tote around and well-thought-out design. The only issues we've had are: 1) stitching between main body and front outside pocket is separating a little at one corner, so don't stuff it too much. 2) The snap for hanging it on shopping carts and strollers won't hold if the bag gets very heavy. 3) I don't trust that the insulated pockets will really keep a bottle cold enough for very long. I love everything else about it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fegan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I received several baby bags during the baby shower. However, they all were very generic in terms of storage (and they were big) which is not easy to lug around with all the other baby stuff. I found this bag to be quite remarkable. We can store enough diapers for a weekend trip, bottles, lotions, you name it. Be mindful that it is not as large as other more traditional baby bags but it stores just as much as their larger counterparts. Also, as a guy, I really like the fact that it looks like a regular backpack, which is a little more stylish for dad to roll in. Overall, a very good purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Asencio

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag for parents!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 kids after seeing our neighbor with one. This backpack is awesome. We swapped this as an alternative to the traditional messenger type diaper bag about 2 years ago and have left the old one in the closet since! This backpack is much more comfortable and storage capacity/options are even better. Not to mention as a dad I feel aesthetically this is much more stylish for me :) I love that it has multiple access points to the main compartment so I don't have to jam my hand into the bag and rummage around the bottom looking for something. A definite must-buy for parents!
customer_reviews.author: TShepp

customer_reviews.title: I would go with the black or another color that would go better with the off accent colors
customer_reviews.text: The structure & functionality of this bag are top notch! There is a place for everything, & it stays there. The downside for me is the color combo. I got the grey one & it looks cheap because they paired it with 2 different shades of gold (zippers & all metal pieces) as well as a tan that just doesn't blend. I would go with the black or another color that would go better with the off accent colors. I have only had it about a week so we'll see how well it holds up to momlife.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron M

customer_reviews.title: Durable, affordable, and CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! I got the “orange” because reviews told me it’s more pink than orange, and when it came you can see it’s more a salmon pinkish color, very cute! I was using a bulky Medela diaper bag with about three pockets. This bag has sooo many different zippers and storage areas in and out. I will never be ruffling through my diaper bag again trying to find what I’m looking for. I can use one hand to unzip and navigate throughout the giant, deep pockets. Thank you to the manufacturer for making this durable and affordable and cute in color! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Brignoni

customer_reviews.title: Bottles barely fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I refuse to give this 5 stars is that the bottles BARELY fit. I had to force the zipper around...and this is just a 4oz dr brown bottle! No way fitting an 8oz bottle which is inconvenient for babies that are feeding above the 4oz or bigger bottles in general such as playtex! It appears a lot larger in the pictures than it is in person. I ordered a sunveno brand bag as well as a back up to see which one is better, and I am praying it is the other one! Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, hard to put on stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag, just be more careful opening them coz of the reviews that said the zipper breaks easily. 3 stars coz its almost impossible to close this while hanging on stroller, you gotta use 2 hands and close the opening while zipping it. And you have to buy stroller hook in able to hang it. In my case i took out from my other bag its shoulder strap and insert it in its backStraps so it's easier to hang on my stroller. hope that they can put a long strap for an option to make it as shoulder bag, and it will be easy to hang on stroller too.
customer_reviews.author: Cc bear

customer_reviews.title: Seam came a apart but love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag in December, but only been using since July since that's when my baby arrived. It's now 5 months later and the seam on the inside pocket has come apart. Other than that, I like this bag it has a lot of pockets. Not sure how it came apart since I don't put anything sharp in the bag. I'll be replacing the bag, but not sure yet if I'll replace with this brand. I'm going to try to use a few more months to see how the other pockets hold up. If that seems to be the only issue, then I may purchase again and charge this one up to a fluke accident.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: My first impression when I recieved this was that it was tiny. But then I decided it would probably fit everything I need and it does, but not with much extra room. I love the way it looks, I got the blue and it's beautiful. You need two hands to open it which is the biggest drawback. I like it well enough, I don't think I'd rebuy it if it broke though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Torn strap Barely used
customer_reviews.text: This bag was barely used and the shoulder strap has already torn. I used it a few times for extra clothes and snacks for my toddler. See pics, you can see it still looks like a new bag. I didn’t expect this bag to last forever, but this is total junk. If this was a good quality bag, I’d recommend that the zippers be better and front pocket should be a double zipper.
customer_reviews.author: TDutts10

customer_reviews.title: The perfect project bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to hold my latest crochet project, and it works GREAT! There are lots of pockets, and deep enough to hold my hooks. The opening at the bottom allows for me to access my yarn, and it has plenty of room to stack even the biggest of projects on top when I put it away. The backpack feature with additional handles on top make it easy to carry whether I have it zipped or not. The material it is made with seems very high quality and durable, although I haven’t done anything strenuous to test it. It’s very attractive and I get compliments anytime I go somewhere and have it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Receive several compliments on this bag. The color is gorgeous, it's an easter pink, orange color, and my hubby wears it all the time when we have the baby, it truly is a fashion piece. People ask us all the time where we bought it, and I was lucky enough to snag this one on sale. Loads of space, I carry extra set of clothes for the baby, plenty of diapers (size 1), wipes, burp clothes, sanitizer, bottles, my hand pump and a water bottle. People this bag is deep and has a few compartments on the side for easy access to burp cloths as well as my cart hammock and plastic doggy bag for diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Grew mold
customer_reviews.text: I have loveeeed this bag! So much storage space. Comfy to wear and cute! I’m 8months in to using this bag and the compartment where the bottles are held starting growing black spots. I thought maybe it just got dirty? But I never have anything black in there so it turned out to be mold 😞 need to find a new diaper bag now
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, but hanging on a stroller wasn’t very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 other bags and compared them and I liked this one best. I’m 4’11 and I didn’t want a large backpack hanging off my bag. This was a great size and still stored everything I need. Has a key ring, place for my phone and wallet that easily accessible. Exterior zippers feel good quality but the inside ones feel like they might give out after good use... I really liked everything about this bag except the button used for the handles to hang on a stroller isn’t very strong. My bag has a 12oz thermos in it so maybe it was the weight? Popped right off onto the floor. Other than that, I really love the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming undone
customer_reviews.text: So I received at this diaper bag a weeks ago, and when I hung it up I noticed that the stitching is very noticeable. Also there is no division from the big pocket, so it’s just a large pocket that you can enter from the side zipper as well. Overall, we like the bag! It’s very roomy, the quality of the fabric seems durable. Hoping to get a replacement bag or the stitching problem. Will update review when, I receive a replacement. Update: The company was great! They where able to take care of my issues and it has been fix the problem. Loving my new bag :)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit conflicted about this bag... The first this I noticed was that the color in real life in much more muted than the images online. I bought the dark blue with gold zippers, but it's more of a grey/blue with grey zippers. Not a deal breaker though. I also thought, based on the images, that there would be much more expandable room inside the bag, but unfortunately the whole pack seems too slender and too small for more than one of each of the essential items. No doubt this bag is stylish and sleek, but I'm not sure it will be very functional for my baby, especially as he grows out of the newborn stage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Compartments are unrealistic
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad bag but i don’t like that there is just a slit in the side pocket for wipes- that is unrealistic to have an open wipe container there at all times with a wipe sticking out... also the bottle storage only holds little bottles so once you progress to larger bottles they will not fit in the bottle pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Kayelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag for 1.5
customer_reviews.text: I am guilty of buying quite a few diaper bags off of Amazon. I've tried many styles. I love this diaper bag. It's been my staple for the past two years. I have a two-year-old and a 10-month-old and it will fit everything inside, but looks very full. I simply needed to size up. I love it, and I'd buy it again in a heartbeat. If you are thinking about it, just go for it. I regularly stock it with diapers and wipes for two, a wet/dry bag with clothes for two, snacks, puffs, toys, my wallet and phone, nursing cover, three books and various creams.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle holder pockets are too small
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I like the size of the bag and all the pouches on the interior that allow for access to things inside the bag. Cons: some parts of the bag are definitely cheaply made (the strap that buckles the carrying straps together). And the biggest con for me.... the pouches that hold the bottles are too narrow. We used Tommy tippee bottles with our first and planned to do the same this round. They don't even come close to fitting. It also looks like the outer part of the bottle part doesn't expand so it doesn't look like it'll even zip closed if a narrow bottle is put in.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is awesome, especially for travel. My wife got it specifically for flying with our baby. It's large enough to fit everything she needed (literally walked onto the plane with this bag and our baby) and it has enough pockets/specialized organization to make everything easy to access. We specifically wanted one that opens like this one - it was so easy to keep it open and grab things without having to take everything out. The bag stays upright really well so we didn't need to worry about it falling over. Bonus - it's super lightweight but feels like quality material, and my wife loves that it looks pretty great too. Highly recommend this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap material but also not durable material either
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very beautiful bag! I love that it has so many compartments and of course, it’s very spacious. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the material doesn’t feel thick to me. It doesn’t feel like cheap material, but it doesn’t have that durable quality you would expect from a diaper bag. Not sure if I’m explaining myself correctly. Other than that, bag came in perfect condition, the colors are amazing and I will buy other colors soon!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. & Mr. Mazi

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag and all the pouches to stay organized!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd like this bag as much as I do. In the bottom I keep my wipes and diapers cause those are things I can stack on top off but still use. Having the back zipper helps keeps me organized without pulling everything out for a diaper. Plenty of quick access pouches on inside (extra outfits, sanitizer, snacks for my toddler, burp cloths, sunscreen). There is a small zipper pouch on the upper back. That's my "dirty" pouch for my wallet, keys and phone... Since I don't take my purse. I love this bag so much.
customer_reviews.author: ErMyIaLnY

customer_reviews.title: Small backpack that can’t hold enough to make up for its style
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is tiny. It’s roughly the size of a toddler backpack. While it’s an attractive fabric and style, its’ size makes it a waste of money. This might work for an infant as their stuff is small but I can’t imagine it scaling up for a toddler. Additionally, if you are tall or a larger framed person, you won’t be able to wear this on both arms (my husband literally couldn’t get it on). We decided to return it within one minute of opening the box. Cute but a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality isn't perfect...it looks like overtime the seams might loosen or come undone, this diaper bag will definitely be my primary bag until it does fall apart. I used this as my under seat bag while traveling recently and it was perfect. There is so much room on the inside for diapers, clothes, sunglasses, food, etc. And all the pockets on the outside hold so much and keep everything organized. This was a lifesaver in Disney World. The amount this bag holds is exactly what I was looking for. Especially with a second baby on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pockets for days
customer_reviews.text: So. Many. Pockets!! I love it. A compartment for everything. And I love that the bottom has the access zipper so you can get things at the bottom of the bag without taking everything out. Unfortunately someone robbed my car while out hiking recently and stole my diaper bag (who does that?!) but I’m definitely going to repurchase soon because this is the best diaper bag I’ve owned! Backpack style=hands free mama
customer_reviews.author: Coolmama23

customer_reviews.title: Day 1, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this diaper bag and it arrived really quick. I got the brown because of the stain factor and I really love it. Just got it today so hopefully it will last for awhile. It seems to be very durable and it has alot of pockets to hold everything that you would need that comes along with a newborn, even enough room for a breast pump. However, the only thing that wasn't as described is the side tissue pocket, there is no slit in the fabric. But I'm not concerned about that bc I doubt I'd use it for that reason
customer_reviews.author: Sam Robin

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag now that I have an infant again, and a potty trained toddler. I can fit everything for the baby and an emergency pair of pants for the toddler. The only negative is you need two hands to zip the top closed. One to hold the bag closed and the other to zip. As lame as it sounds, its tough to have 2 available hands when also out with a baby and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: We had the Colombia diaper bag for 3 years which served us very well. It started to tear after having overstuffing it for 2 kids under 3yo in there. When getting a new bag we almost went with the Colombia bag again, but this was on sale and had good reviews, so we decided to try it. Glad we did. The bag is spacious, has lots of compartments for things so you're not scavenging through the bag for stuff. It's also nicely designed. We've only had it for a few weeks, so hard to say ours durable but do far it looks like it will hold up for a long time. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: capatel81

customer_reviews.title: Best bag evvvvver!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. My favorite part is that you can pack the middle to the top, roll up a blankie and then buckle it in! Drinks and wipes are easily accesible without the normal unattractive mesh. The pockets around the top inside of the bag mean I dont have to dig at the bottom, I see everything the moment I open the bag. And the structured design of the bag doesnt let things get squished or sink. Amazing product. Amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Mac & Car White

customer_reviews.title: Worth 25.00
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag for a month now and it’s earned itself an extra star from my original three star rating. Upon receiving the bag in the mail I was thoroughly unimpressed. I didn’t think it would hold up to wear and tear or hold much. It’s been to my delight that this bag not only holds what you need in a diaper bag but it also seems to be pretty durable. Ive received quite a few compliments on it as well. Overall I’d say it’s worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SuspectingSuspect

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. After using crappy back packs and over the shoulder diaper bags I have a girl crush on this diaper bag. Its cute and I love the access pocket on the back. Put the diapers and wipes on the bottom so you dont have to dig to get to what you need. Hold everything. Even coloring books and crayons for the big one. I would definitely buy again and recomend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concept! Straps disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this bag is FANTASTIC! It’s awesome except that I’m 6ft y’all and the shoulder straps are so narrow and short that the padding ends before my shoulders and I’m not super overweight so... that was disappointing. Loved how it held my things, accessibility, access to the bottom of the bag... but horribly uncomfortable to carry. Return went smoothly. Went with a backpack that’s just a normal backpack with padded straps that are normal sized instead.
customer_reviews.author: uhtred6

customer_reviews.title: Okay diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong, this diaper bag is very stylish, but mines did fade after a couple of months. I got the blue one so both me and hubby can carry it around. There's is only one part of the where there's a thermo part to keep the bottles cold or warm. But that part is a little small so I cant fit my bigger bottles in there. The bigger pocket is pretty spacious to keep a couple diapers, wipes, and maybe 2 outfits. Not a bad bag for a short trip to the doctors or something.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Phan

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: It was the diaper bag that we bought when we had our first child: it is practical, it fits everything we need when we go out with our daughter and its external appearance is very beautiful. In fact its durability is proof of everything because it is so in good condition after two years that it is the same that we are going to use for our second child.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Poveda Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Stitching of strap came undone after only one month of use. I don't even use it daily, but the strap is about to come off. Also, straps could be padded a lot more. UPDATE: After my previous 1-star review, the seller very generously offered to send me a new one, and didn't even ask me to revise my rating of the product.
customer_reviews.author: BananaBread14

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd diaper bag(j.j. Cole messenger bag, Coach diaper bag, and a regular backpack) in the last 6 years, and I’m expecting my 4th baby currently. Over the years I’ve realized that the backpack style is the way to go. This diaper bag is way better than I ever expected, especially for that price. It’s not as big and boxy as a regular backpack, and it has tons of pockets to fill it with whatever you could possibly need. It’s super cute and the grey color is really nice. The zippers all seem durable, and the straps aren’t too thick, either. Overall, I am extremely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 months in review
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this. We have used it for 8 months, it's stood up to going everywhere baby goes. The multiple access to pockets is great and makes it easy to use when you stuff it full and need to get to the bottom fast. We're pretty hard on it but it hasn't broken yet, the zipper is good at all spots and the inside has a plastic that is easy to clean. The price point was also great and compared to some of the other diaper bags we saw, very realistic. My only suggestion would be that it is a little smaller than some of the other diaper bags but this makes it super portable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen this bag advertised all over social media but was nervous to buy it anywhere other than Amazon because I’ve seen it associated with a lot of scam websites. I received the bag a few days ago and love it. Initially I was a little concerned because it seemed smaller than I was expecting, however once I started filling up all the pockets I was pleasantly surprised that everything fit easily. It is a fantastic upgrade on the backpack I’ve been using with my 3yr old and I’m confident that once my new baby arrives (any day now) that I will be able to comfortably fit everything I need for both of them. Stylish design, looks great in person.
customer_reviews.author: S Louise M

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly “large capacity”...
customer_reviews.text: The diaper bag is stylish and has many useful pockets and features (love the side wipe compartment). So why the 4 Stars?? This bag is marketed as a “large capacity” bag... this has to be the smallest diaper bag I own (and I own 4). It does fit the essentials but if you are buying this because you want a big bag to fill tons of stuff while traveling (which is why I bought it) this isn’t for you. I will be keeping it since this bag is gorgeous and will be good when I’m done traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Micaila

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: This Diaper Backpack is the Best Helper when it comes down to having things ready for your baby . It has a Large amount of room for the Diapers. Changing clothes anything . it has Pocket for your Wipes. Zipper Pocket thats Thermal for the Bottles . Its great for When your Breast feeding . Has another Hidden Pocket for Where you want to hide your Phone/Wallet . It just has Every single thing you new for a Busy mom . i cant wait to give to a Friend at a Baby shower . I would really recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Keaonna

customer_reviews.title: All Moms Need This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a multi-function diaper bag to use for my twins. I shopped around and was looking for something stylish with a reasonable price tag. This was it! I received it a few weeks ago and had so much fun filling it up with all the necessities! I love the zipper in the back and the insulated area. I also like the fact that it is much more stylish then a typical diaper bag! There is a lot of space and lots of pockets to make finding things when my hands are full. I have already recommended this bag to a few friends. I'm so glad I received this before our family vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is alot smaller than I thought it would be. There is room for alot. The straps are not very cushy for all the stuff you have to carry and the diapers fit in just right, but there isn't much room in the inside, even though there are pockets and compartments. I feel like I have alot of stuff in the pockets so there is not much room for the main part. It is cute, but I wish it could be a bit bigger. Overall I'm happy about the purchase bc I love pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Karmen D

customer_reviews.title: My New Pump Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a pumping bag vice a diaper bag and it works very well. The only qualm I have is that the straps kind of dig into your arms, and rub against your skin very abrasively. If I’m wearing a T-shirt instead of a tank top or dress, I cant tell. But there are some days where I have a short sleeve shirt on that has shorter than normal sleeves and it just hurts to put both straps on. Other than that - this bag is amazing. Super roomy, toms of pockets, and a really awesome/modern design. I would still recommend this bag, especially for the amazing cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime_Ranay

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, nice zippers
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Very roomy. Pocket on the back let's you get to the bottom of the main bin if something gets buried, or if you want to keep your pump in there. we keep a couple swaddle blankets, and extra outfit, multiple diapers, wipes, etc with room to spare. Multiple pockets inside to keep diapers, pacifiers, diaper creams, etc. Front pocket with room for 3 bottles in insulated holders. Side pockets for wipes, diapers, etc. Only negative is the straps seems to slide and extend when wearing. Sometimes the cord will pull all the way through and need rethreaded. Hasn't caused any problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wickersham

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I am completely impressed with this diaper backpack. I didn’t want to do the traditional diaper bag as I had already used one for my first born and didn’t like it at all. I feel that a backpack is much more convenient to carry and take to places. Not only is the color on this bag pretty, but it’s huge inside. I can fit so many things inside. I love the bottle section in the front and the wipe section on the sides. I love organizing so this is the perfect backpack for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aidil S.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for 8oz bottles
customer_reviews.text: The bag works good but the only problem I have is the front bottle pocket... not tall enough for my 8oz bottles (Dr.brown) I have to really stretch and tilt them to get them down in there. And I dong get that small wipe pouch on the side... u can not get a wipe out of there unless u take out the package. And not enough pockets. But my husband likes it bc it’s not girly lol
customer_reviews.author: Heather A. Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, silly label
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this bag except the cheesy label - “chic and practical, always the best”. Silly. I also wish it didn’t say “mommy and baby bag” right on the front... I know it’s technically a diaper bag but I’m using it for work because I love all the compartments (great for comp charger, pens, calculator, etc). Other than the superfluous label, it’s awesome. Durable, sleek, efficient. Chic and practical even! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Shelagh Powers

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag it doesn't make me feel like I'm carrying just a diaper bag but still a mom bag. I just had a new born son and I wanted something that wasn't just a bag I love all of the pockets I love that it has a front pocket just for bottles and little water bottles it literally has everything I could ask for in a diaper bag. The only thing I do not like is that the zipper tends to get stuck on the top and you have to have it perfectly closed and not full to have the bag closed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my toddler actually. She has a medical condition and is not able to walk-so carrying her around with a shoulder diaper bag and my purse is a PAIN. I opted for a backpack so i can carry her without bags swinging around and almost hitting her when i set her down. And it’s just less stuff. The best part in my opinion is the opening so you can access the bottom of the bag. That’s the issue i always have with diaper bags. Things get stuffed at the bottom then by the time they come out she doesn’t even wear that size anymore! Lol. Awesome bag and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alis M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I have been on the hunt for a good quality, spacious diaper backpack that both my husband and I can use. I order a few different options to compare and out of all the bags my favorite is the HapTim Diaper Backpack. As you’ll see on my video this HaloVa back is extremely poor quality and flimsy. I do not recommend purchasing this bag. You can get better options for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Laino

customer_reviews.title: Durable, trendy-cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased. The first one was for my daughter’s baby shower....hence, for her baby. The one I just got was for another daughter for her to use at college and at work. Yes, it’s a “diaper bag” but she loves all the ways in which you can store cold things, transport needful work and school items, etc. VERY versatile bag! They both LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the fact the material is VERY sturdy and can go through allot and STILL be durable. I love all the compartments and I also the the fact I can hang it from the handle of the stroller and not have to bend down and fight the stroller to put it on the bottom. I am thinking of buying a second one just to have one for myself. I wished I had bought this sooner when I was flying with my baby. The other diaper bag was so big it barely fit under the airplane seat.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the "Orange" model and it is most definitely NOT your traditional orange color (we expected this based on the other reviews). I would describe the color as a coral/pink depending on the light and the direction you're looking at the bag...this is exactly what my wife wanted. Everything about the bag seems very functional and well laid out. I'm not sure about durability since we've only had it for a couple weeks but the wife thinks it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: RD_3

customer_reviews.title: One day bag
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and color of the bag is wonderful. It is very classy and practical. I appreciate the thought and detail that went into this bag. What I don't like: This bag is truly designed only to be used as a daily bag, if you are a person that likes to carry everything in case of emergency plus the kitchen sink, this bag is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I purchased this diaper bag. It has the perfect amount of space and I love the bottle holding feature in the front. It gives enough space for me to add my ice pack to keep the bottles cold while I’m out. I also love the coral color. I’ve received a ton of compliments on it and people are shocked when I tell them it’s a diaper bag. The material is also really good quality. I would definitely recommend it and purchase it again. I am also buying one for my sister for her baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been skeptical about this bag because there are so many different brandsbut after receiving it and seeing it in person I'm very impressed with the quality. I have 2 toddlers and 1 infant. I can easily fit items in for each child comfortably. Fabric looks and feels very well made. I will say that it seems like you need to use thin round bottles for them to fit in the front pouch. I use como tomo bottles and they don't fit but I still adore this bag. I can utilize the pockets in other ways.
customer_reviews.author: cherribomb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Bought it as a first time mom and it did a great job keeping everything inside! I love it, it even got space for toys for my baby. Now at eight months I always need to carry toys with me! Doesn’t let water go from outside to inside, however leaks from inside to outside do pass through! Quality is good and so far durability is good and I mean it because I am not easy on this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Moly

customer_reviews.title: Good design, excellent storage capacity.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is small but with roomie storage capacity. The design has 5 stars, the quality 3. I already see a couple of string coming out.. But hopefully last long anyways. Extra point for the design on the gray color is a good unisex and comfortable option. I pack my 20 months old lunchbox (bentgo), diapers, wipes, blanket, white noise and paci and his water cup. Plus my own snacks, coffee cup and water bottle... Everything fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Geeeet it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! I’ve been using this bag for about 3 months. It’s got lots of pockets and space. But it’s not so big that I feel like I have to fill it up with stuff! This bag fits my baby’s diapers, wipes, several outfits, my wallet and planner all in the main center. Side and front pockets have great spaces for my water, hand sanitizer, and even 3 bottles. I love this bag!! I have friends who have spent $120+ on diaper bags that only last for about a year. I’m super pleased with my choice here! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: AujSee

customer_reviews.title: The bag has a good amount of pockets to organize your diapering needs
customer_reviews.text: EDIT 05/03/18: Added 1 star for great customer service. Seller emailed me after I posted my review and was very concerned. Personally, I am not a fan of this bag. My wife on the other hand loves it. The bag has a good amount of pockets to organize your diapering needs. Quality seems really good which is a definite plus. My complaints are with the capacity and closing the top zipper. I feel like this bag doesn't hold as much as some others, but it really could be due to the top zipper. I might be a moron, but you need 2 hands to close this bag, and that is very annoying to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrett Loop

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and Plastic-y
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed by the quality. I bought the gray linen one when my daughter was born and we loved it, the inside was spacious and it was well made. The fabric was washable but didn’t feel like plastic. This black one was a repurchase as the first diaper bag has worn down after 2 years. The material feels like hard polyester and the inside lining is like stiff plastic not fabric like my other one. The black diaper bag was also slightly larger which I did not like. Returning the item and searching for a better diaperbag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and price
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. There's lots of storage room, more than enough for the baby's things so I added a few of my own and don't need to carry a purse when I have it. There's a large main pouch with a wide opening that has several pockets for various things like diaper cream, hand sanitizer, pacifiers, etc. with a zipper on the back that opens up into the main compartment. Then there's a zipper pocket on the front with insulated pouches where you can keep bottles. Also it's cute and the price was right. It's a yes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Clark

customer_reviews.title: HaloVa Diaper Bag -grey color
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bag. We are going to use it as a diaper bag, when our baby gets here, but she used it on vacation just to test out the durability, comfort, and capacity of it. Overall, my wife loved everything about this bag. She wouldn't find anything negative to say about it, as everything she want to put in it fit, it was comfortable to carry, and holds up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Inside ripped after slight use
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to give this bag a higher review considering it became our main one after I found that carrying a side tote diaper bag was in practical when carrying a baby, however, it ripped on the inside. Although we've had it now for a year or so, it ripped within the first few months of use. The area that ripped is on the inside on the back end where the inside zipper is. It would have gotten a much higher review due to the space on the inside and the different sections, which I like. However, ripping after that short period of use for the price we paid is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks exactly like the pictures. I absolutely love it! It holds everything the baby could need plus some of my things without making it bulky. Which is saying a lot since I tend to over pack things. 100% recommend buying this bag. You won’t regret it!! I originally bought a different diaper bag but was very disappointed in it since things would fall out. This one is holds everything and is so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love the color first of all. The space is incredible. I can use it as a diaper bag and a purse at the same time. I can fit a few bottles, diapers, a pack of wipes, a changing matt, diaper ointment, my wallet, makeup kit, Food and drinks for myself. And there's still room left over. The straps are very thick and soft as well so it's comfortable to wear even when heavy. Will probably buy a couple more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Destini Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall loved the bag and only 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Plenty of storage and pockets. I bought the gray and love the color. I like that it’s more like a back pack and is on my back and out of the way but the only thing I don’t like is sometimes it’s hard to open at the most in convenient times. The zipper has some kind of support running through it so if your trying to get into the bag while holding the baby it’s not gonna happen. You have to put the bag down to get into it
customer_reviews.author: Anna c

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but it not spacious enough. I have to carry stuffs for 2 kids and I can't keep much things inside it. There is no place to keep diaper changing mat and it doesn't come with stroller straps as well. I have 8oz Dr Brown bottle set (both original and latest green ones). It's very difficult to keep Dr Brown original bottles in the designated bottle holder as the zip will not close. Dr Brown green bottles are snug fit and the seams have started to fall apart within 1 week of use. Even if I keep less stuffs, the bag looks bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sans

customer_reviews.title: So much room!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this bag. I haven't used it yet as it's packed and waiting the arrival of my second. But its got plenty of room. It's packed with a changing pad, 5 baby outfits, socks, gloves, 2 hats,lovey, 2 burp rags, bib, paci, 3 diapers, full pack of wipes and I kid you not it's only half full. Plenty of room if I wanted to pack my toddler stuff too. The color orange is more like a peach and the material is slick so should be easy to wipe out and clean.
customer_reviews.author: meganp

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Bought it to use as a breast pump bag as most breast pump bags are super pricey. Love that this one has the back pocket for direct access to the pump. I have a spectra and it fits well. I keep all the pump accessories inside the main compartment's pockets. Also like that there are insulated bottle pouches in the front. It's a perfect size for what I'm using it for but if it were only used as a diaper bag it would probably be on the smaller side once you add blankets, diapers and clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks initially
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use as a work bag rather than a diaper bag, and for that purpose, it looks like a good fit. The material is not as high quality as I would have expected, particularly the zippers, but time will tell. I will update after a few weeks. If I could change one thing, I would add side clips so I could attach a strap to carry over the shoulder instead of using the backpack straps. I am anxious to see how the material wears over the next couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect breast pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my current diaper backpack as current was full from just my daughter's things and we had baby in September. I ended up not loving it as a diaper bag but so so so perfect for breast pump. Only reason I didn't like for diaper bag was the zipper opening on the back side didn't seem useful and I like more separate sections. The back zipper is perfect for opening to access pump without having to unpack it. Just unzip, plug in and stick tubes onto your pumping supplies. Has enough room to carry your lunch, pumping supplies, water bottle and more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag a lot more than other diaper bag we’ve tried, but my one dislike is that the bottom pocket in the back isn’t for a separate compartment, it just opens to the bottom part of the main pocket. I put the containers of baby formula there, but we still sometimes have to dig a little to get to them. A separate compartment would’ve been a lot more convenient. Other than that, I haven’t really had any problems with it and I love that it has so many pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Charmomder

customer_reviews.title: Backpack Diaper Bags are a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS BAG! It is an excellent diaper bag. It has an incredible amount of storage- I am able to carry all that I need for my infant and change of clothes for me (because, you know, accidents....). I love the red color, it is bright and vibrant. The insulated bottle holders in the front pocket keep a bottle from the fridge chilled for a few hours. I loved mine so much I purchased one for my sister for her baby shower. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: M.Evans

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage, convenient back pocket with easy access
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for storage, lots of pockets and i love you I can get to the bottom of the bag from the back instead of taking every thing out! I would have given it 5 stars but you have to unzip it completely on the top or its nearly impossible to get in to it and the zippers are so strong its hard to open with 1 hand, more times then not I have found myself fighting to get in it while holding the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit Spectra, but did not hold up to daily use.
customer_reviews.text: The bag fit my spectra breast pump, barely. There was a bulge. It wasn’t the easiest bag to clean and that led to mold within the lining when breast milk spilled, so I’m unable to use it. Also the seams ripped on inside and there were loose threads in the pockets. I really wanted this bag to last, as I need a pump bag for my job and I know people who really enjoyed this bag. However, after just a few months of daily use, it has fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Csantos14

product_meta.title: HaloVa Diaper Bag Multi-Function Waterproof Travel Backpack Nappy Bags for Baby Care, Large Capacity, Stylish and Durable, Gray
feature_bullets: ❤ Original Design by HaloVa - Lager Capacity with plenty of pockets, has a place for everything, well-constructed not bulky even when filled.
❤ More Useful Designs for Baby and Mommy - Including separate wet clothes pocket, Tissue Pocket, etc, very easy to carry and use.
❤ Keep Feeding Bottle Warm - Separate aluminum foil pockets can keep bottle warm, Suitable for most of 4-8 ounce bottles.
❤ High Standard in Quality- High density oxford fabric, waterproof, durable and will last for years when properly use.
❤ After-sales Service - For quality problem: Full Refund within 90 days and Replacement within 3 years.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,298 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
